source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_000<tab>Gaheel Ja not see any other Mamool Ja here. Why is this?
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_000<tab>追い出さ、れないか、心配で、す……。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_Q1_000_000<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_001<tab>Acquire Whalaqee totems.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_001<tab>「ブルートーテム」の入手

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_002<tab>Ask about blue magic.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_002<tab>「青魔道士」について聞く

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_003<tab>Ask about the blue magic spellbook.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_003<tab>「青魔道書」について聞く

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_004<tab>Small talk.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_004<tab>話す

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_005<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_A1_000_005<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_010<tab>Totems hold aether of beasts from across Indigo Deep. They teach you blue magic without risk of being eaten!
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_010<tab>ワラキ族伝統、のトーテム、像を真似、て、
青魔法の知、識を封じ、てみたもの、です……。
今のあな、たなら、コレらを使い、こなせるで、しょう。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_015<tab>Gaheel Ja is sorry, but <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> not ready for totems.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_015<tab>申し訳、ないので、すが、
今の<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、に、
渡せる、ブルートーテムは、ございま、せん……。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_020<tab>Blue magic discovered by Whalaqee. They live far from here, across Indigo Deep.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_020<tab>青魔道士、の起源は、新大陸に住む、
少数部族「ワラキ族」の、魔法にありま、す。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_021<tab>Whalaqee know many things, and see into souls of beasts.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_021<tab>あらゆ、る自然を崇拝して、いた彼らは、信仰対象に近付こうと、
獣や魔物、が用いる魔法を、己のもの、とする術を、
編み出したの、です。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_022<tab>When creature attacks, Whalaqee look into eyes and understand how it control aether. This secret of blue magic.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_022<tab>魔法発動、の鍵となる獣や、魔物の敵意を身に、受け、
魔法現象を、引き起こさせ、その上で相手、を斃し、
命の源た、るエーテルを吸収、する。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_023<tab>Martyn learned this from Whalaqee. Now he teach Eorzeans like you.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_023<tab>先生は、この秘技、を学ぶこと、に成功し、
「ラーニング」と呼んでいま、す。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_024<tab>Remember─color blue very important. Whalaqee love blue things. Blue sky, blue sea, blue canyon. Even clothes blue. That is why it called blue magic.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_024<tab>そして、この魔法を、ワラキ族が神聖、とする色から、とり、
新たな魔法体系、「青魔法」と、名付け、
先生自らが、青魔道士の、先駆け、となったの、です。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_025<tab>Deep like ocean, endless like sky, blue magic is. No one, not even Whalaqee, understand all its mysteries.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_025<tab>世界中、の獣や魔物の魔法、を操る青魔道士、の可能性は、
まだまだ、未知数……無限大、とも言えま、す……。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_030<tab>Martyn write spellbook to help novices like you. It tell where to learn blue magic.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_030<tab>青魔道書、とは、先生がエオルゼア中、を渡り歩き、
獣や魔物から、修得した青魔法の、修得場所、を記録した、もの。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_031<tab>Why some names of creatures missing from book, you say? Like Whalaqee, Martyn spends much time in forests, deserts, plains, and fight many beasts. This part of training, he says. Strong mage casts strong spells. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> must become strong, too.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_031<tab>なぜ、修得場所、だけなのかと、いうと、
自分で探すこと、も修行の一環との、ことだそう、です。
これを片手、に青魔道士の修行、に、励んで、ください。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_032<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> should not complain─this book very rare! Not many copies out there, so try not to lose it.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_032<tab>ちなみに、数量限定、という触れ込み、ですが、
在庫は、余りまくって、ます……。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_040<tab>Latool Ja and Gaheel Ja know some blue magic too. We from Boonewa tribe, best spellcasters of all Mamool Ja. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> make us angry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> be sorry! Ha ha! Gaheel Ja only joking.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_040<tab>私とラトージャ、も一応、青魔道士の、はしくれ、です。
マムージャ族、の中でも、私たちはブネワ族、といって、
生まれながら、に豊かな魔力を、持っていま、す。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_050<tab>Why Martyn say nothing about Whalaqee disease? Why he do everything alone? Most times, Gaheel Ja think Martyn very clever, but this time Martyn very stupid! Very stupid indeed!
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_050<tab>先生、にワラキ族を救う、なんて大きな志があった、とは。
私たち、にも打ち明けて、くれればいい、ものを……。
もっとも、どうせ力には、なれませんが、ね。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_060<tab>Azulmagia─I mean Whastrach─is best blue mage in Eorzea, even better than Martyn. Whastrach very talented spellcaster, so why he become “busyness man” instead? Gaheel Ja think he make bad choice.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_060<tab>アポカリョープスこと、ヴァストラッハさん、は、
あらゆ、る青魔法を修得した、まさに、達人。
勝つには、たくさんの青魔法、が必要となるで、しょう……。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> beat Whastrach! Now <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> strongest blue mage! Maybe Martyn should be your apprentice now.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_070<tab>アポカリョープスこと、ヴァストラッハさん、に勝つとは、
名実ともに、先生を越えま、したね。
これから、も期待して、ます！

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_080<tab>Martyn find many new spells. Now they written in your book. But reading book not enough. You must learn them for yourself!
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_080<tab>あな、たの、青魔道書に、新たな青魔法、が追記されま、した。
どうぞ、ラーニング、に勤しんで、くださ、い。
ところ、で、いったい先生は、いつの間に、書いたので、しょう？

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_090<tab>Can Martyn beat Siegfried? Gaheel Ja not know, but this good chance to promote the guild!
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_090<tab>先生が、戦うことに、なった、ジークフリードは、
正規のコロセウム、のスターだと、か……。
青魔道士、の名を上げる、チャンスでも、ありま、すね。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> very strong, but Siegfried not hesitate to use dirty tricks. Be very careful!
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_100<tab>新た、な、ジークフリードは、帝国製の武器で、武装し、
多彩な攻撃を、してくる、そうで、すね。
勝つため、いろんな青魔法、を修得して、くださ、い。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_110<tab>Gaheel Ja happy you defeat Siegfried! Maybe Celestium become more popular than Coliseum now, yes?
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_110<tab>見事、に、ジークフリードを倒し、
先生の仇、を討って、くれました、ね。
これか、らも、ご活躍を、期待してます、よ！

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_200<tab>Martyn write more blue magic in your spellbook. It is gift of other brave adventurers who join Blue Mages' Guild, so if you are brave, you can learn these new spells too.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_200<tab>あな、たの、青魔道書に、またも青魔法、が追記されま、した。
青魔道士ギルド、に所属する、冒険者たちの、賜物、です。
どうぞ、ラーニング、に努めて、くださ、い。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_210<tab>Mimic man Gogo study Celestium creatures, just like Martyn said he would. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> already champion of Masked Carnivale, so maybe those tricks not work on you, yes?
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_210<tab>ゴゴは、マスクカーニバルの魔物、の技を、
次々と、ラーニングしている、ようです。
こちらも、負けては、いられません、ね。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_220<tab>You made Gogo go bye-bye! See? Gaheel Ja just as smart with words as Latool Ja!
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_220<tab>ゴゴ戦の、勝利、おめでとうござい、ます！
これか、らも、更なるご活躍、期待してます、よ！

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_300<tab>Martyn write more blue magic in your spellbook. He say it is gift from adventurers who travel to far away lands. Maybe someday, you will see these lands too.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_300<tab>あな、たの、青魔道書に、さらに青魔法、が追記されま、した。
見知らぬ、土地にまで広がった、青魔道士たちの賜物、です。
さあ、ラーニング、に努めて、くださ、い。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_310<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will finally challenge Martyn? That will be interesting battle. Very, very interesting.
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_310<tab>先生とあな、たの、対決が、見られるなん、て……
生きてて、よかった、です。

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_320<tab>Gaheel Ja impressed you defeat Martyn! Gaheel Ja think you maybe stronger than Martyn, but that is secret between us, yes?
target:
TEXT_CTSETCAOZGAHEELJA_00565_GAHEELJA_000_320<tab>先生との、一戦、とても、感動しまし、た。
これから、も、あなたの躍進を、楽しみにして、ます。
